comment:
For a senior level class, this gentleman is wayyy too serious. Absolutely no reason to fail many seniors -- we are not engaged and don't care anymore. Not saying the class should be easy, but this guy should be a bit more understanding to his students. 

If you're a senior taking this for credit, get ready to try.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: Currently in his 6:30pm class. He is a great professor who cares that we learn the material. Will update again when the semester is over!
